item.title: Beautiful Soup 4 Cheatsheet
item.author: whatacold@gmail.com (whatacold)
item.description: Beautiful Soup Detailed docs: the Beautiful Soup 4 Docs. Assume t is an object of Tag. Core concepts (classes) Tag, a Tag object corresponds to an XML or HTML tag. BeautifulSoup, the BeautifulSoup object represents the parsed document as a whole. You can treat it like a special Tag. It needs a parser to parse the document, a built-in parser is "html.parser", e.g. soup = BeautifulSoup("<html>a web page</html>", 'html.parser') NavigableString, a string corresponds to a bit of text (as you see it in the browser) within a tag.
